messages.title: Who do you trust to stand-up for Colchester residents?
messages.content: Local champion Bob Russell: Bob Russell has a long record of standing up for Colchester's residents both in Parliament and locally. ...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will continue to build a stronger economy by...
Investing in better transport and housing...

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't win here they finished a poor third in 2010.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems will continue to build a stronger economy by...

housing.content: Investing in better transport and housing...

leaflet.personalStatement: Bob Russell has a long record of standing up for Colchester's residents both in Parliament and locally...

images.caption: Collage of various images including Bob Russell, activities in the constituency, and statements.

leaflet.additionalNotes: An ineffective Tory: While the local Conservative has been re-elected to another public office, he has not bothered to stand up for us on the Council and is a part-time Councillor. The Conservatives have a long record of working in the interests of the super-rich - not straightforward Colchester taxpayers. A majority Conservative government would be bad for our area. The Tories would: cut the pay of local public sector workers like nurses, teachers and damaging our local economy.
